text: No tem, kto raskayalsya v svoikh grekhakh, iskrenne uveroval v Allakha i povinovalsya Yemu, sovershaya dobryye dela, - etim Allakh proshchayet grekhi po Svoyemu miloserdiyu i zamenit ikh skvernyye deyaniya blagimi deyaniyami, za kotoryye On im vozdast luchshey nagradoy. Poistine, Allakh - Proshchayushchiy, Miloserdnyy
